skill.name: The Darkin Blade
skill.description: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it.

skill.name: Orb of Deception
skill.description: Ahri fires an orb in a line that returns to her, damaging enemies it passes through.

skill.name: Five Point Strike
skill.description: Akali throws shurikens in front of her, dealing damage.

skill.name: Glacial Storm
skill.description: Anivia channels a large hailstorm, damaging and slowing the attack speed of enemies inside of it.

skill.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
skill.description: Ashe fires an arrow that stuns and damages the farthest enemy. The stun is longer the farther the enemy.

skill.name: Voice of Light
skill.description: Aurelion Sol breathes a large blast of fire in a line, dealing damage to enemies.

skill.name: Rocket Grab
skill.description: Blitzcrank pulls the furthest enemy to him and knocks them up.

skill.name: Pyroclasm
skill.description: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit.

skill.name: Unbreakable
skill.description: Braum gains a barrier that blocks incoming damage.

skill.name: Rupture
skill.description: Cho'gath ruptures an area, stunning and damaging enemies inside of it.

skill.name: Decimate
skill.description: Darius swings his axe, damaging nearby enemies and healing himself based off enemies hit.

skill.name: Spinning Axes
skill.description: Draven gains bonus on-hit damage and Attack Speed. Stacks up to two times.

skill.name: Spider Form
skill.description: Elise summons Spiderlings and transforms, gaining Lifesteal.

skill.name: Last Caress
skill.description: Evelynn deals damage to the 3 closest enemies and teleports away. Damage is increased against low health enemies.

skill.name: Riposte
skill.description: Fiora becomes immune to damage and spells. After a short delay, she stuns and damages the closest enemy.

skill.name: Powder Kegs
skill.description: Gangplank periodically creates barrels. On cast, Gangplank detonates the barrels, damaging nearby enemies.

skill.name: Judgement
skill.description: Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: GNAR!
skill.description: Gnar transforms, gaining Health, Attack Damage and jumping behind the furthest enemy, damaging and stunning enemies nearby.

skill.name: Buckshot
skill.description: Graves' attacks deal increased damage and hit all enemies in front of him.

skill.name: Requiem
skill.description: Karthus deals damage to a number of random enemies after a long channel.

skill.name: Nether Blade
skill.description: Kassadin's attacks steal mana from enemies, converting it into a shield.

skill.name: Death Lotus
skill.description: Katarina channels and fires daggers at a number of nearby enemies, dealing damage and reducing healing.

skill.name: Divine Judgement
skill.description: Kayle shields the weakest ally, making them immune to damage.

skill.name: Slicing Maelstrom
skill.description: Kennen summons a storm around him, dealing damage and stunning enemies inside of it.

skill.name: Taste their Fear
skill.description: Kha'Zix slashes the closest enemy, dealing bonus damage to enemies that are alone.

skill.name: Lamb's Respite
skill.description: Kindred creates a zone around herself that prevents allies from dying.

skill.name: Solar Flare
skill.description: Leona calls down a solar ray that damages and slows enemies inside it. The enemy in the center is stunned.

skill.name: Frozen Tomb
skill.description: Lissandra encases the target in ice, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Below half HP, Lissandra instead encases herself, becoming untargetable.

skill.name: Relentless Pursuit
skill.description: Lucian dashes away to safety and attacks an enemy twice, once with Attack Damage and once with Spell Damage.

skill.name: Wild Growth
skill.description: Lulu grants an ally bonus Health, knocking up enemies near them.

skill.name: Bullet Time
skill.description: Miss Fortune channels and fires several waves of bullets in a cone.

skill.name: Obliterate
skill.description: Mordekaiser slams his mace in front him, dealing damage to two enemies in a line.

skill.name: Soul Shackles
skill.description: Morgana fires chains to nearby enemies, dealing damage and stunning after a short delay if they are still nearby.

skill.name: Primal Surge
skill.description: Nidalee heals herself and the weakest ally, then transforms gaining Attack Damage.

skill.name: Keeper's Verdict
skill.description: Poppy swings her hammer, damaging and knocking up the closest enemy.

skill.name: Phantom Undertow
skill.description: Pyke dashes behind the furthest enemy, creating an afterimage that stuns enemies it passes through.

skill.name: Burrow
skill.description: Rek'Sai burrows for a short duration becoming untargetable and healing. When Rek'Sai unburrows she deals damage and knocks up the closest enemy.

skill.name: Savagery
skill.description: Rengar leaps to the weakest enemy, gaining Attack Speed and Critical Strike Chance.

skill.name: Glacial Prison
skill.description: Sejuani creates a large glacial storm, stunning enemies within it after a short delay.

skill.name: Spirit's Refuge
skill.description: Shen creates a zone around himself, allowing allies to dodge all attacks.

skill.name: Dragon's Descent
skill.description: Shyvana dashes and transforms, gaining Attack Damage and Attack Range. When transformed, her attacks set enemies on fire.

skill.name: Demonflare
skill.description: Swain transforms, draining health from all nearby enemies. At the end of his transformation, Swain sends out a burst of energy dealing damage to nearby enemies.

skill.name: Explosive Charge
skill.description: Tristana places a bomb on her current target that detonates after 3 attacks, damaging nearby enemies.

skill.name: Piercing Arrow
skill.description: Varus charges and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line.

skill.name: Silver Bolts
skill.description: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health.

skill.name: Primordial Burst
skill.description: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy, dealing damage. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar.

skill.name: Thunder Claws
skill.description: Volibear empowers his attacks to chain between enemies, applying on-hit effects.

skill.name: Infinite Duress
skill.description: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning and damaging them while healing himself.

skill.name: Steel Tempest
skill.description: Yasuo stabs forward, damaging two enemies in a line. On third cast, Yasuo instead launches a tornado dealing damage and knocking up enemies in a line.

skill.name: Razor Shuriken
skill.description: Zed throws a shuriken, dealing damage to enemies in a line.

items.name: Cursed Blade
bonus: Attacks have a low chance to Shrink (Reduce enemy's star level by 1).

items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
bonus: Attacks grant 3% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

items.name: Hextech Gunblade
bonus: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.

items.name: Hush
bonus: Attacks have a high chance to Silence.

items.name: Ionic Spark
bonus: Whenever an enemy casts a spell, they take 100 damage.

items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
bonus: On start of combat, all adjacent allies gain a shield of 200.

items.name: Luden's Echo
bonus: Spells deal 100 splash damage on hit.

items.name: Morellonomicon
bonus: Spells deal burn damage equal to 5% of the enemy's maximum health per second.

items.name: Rapid Firecannon
bonus: Wearer's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack Range is doubled.

items.name: Redemption
bonus: On death, heal all nearby allies for 1000 Health.

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane
bonus: Attacks 2 extra targets on attack. Extra attacks deal 50% damage.

items.name: Seraph's Embrace
bonus: Regain 20% mana each time a spell is cast.

items.name: Spear of Shojin
bonus: After casting, wearer gains 20% of its max mana per attack.

items.name: Statikk Shiv
bonus: Every 3rd attack deals 100 splash magical damage.

items.name: Sword Breaker
bonus: Attacks have a chance to disarm.

items.name: Sword of the Divine
bonus: Each second, the wearer has a 5% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike.

items.name: Thornmail
bonus: Reflect 25% of damage taken from attacks.

items.name: Titanic Hydra
bonus: Attacks deal 10% of the wearer's max Health as splash damage.

items.name: Warmog's Armor
bonus: Wearer regenerates 2.5% max Health per second.

items.name: Zephyr
bonus: On start of combat, banish an enemy for 5 seconds.

tribes.name: Demon
tribes.effect: Attacks from Demons have a chance to burn all of an enemy's mana and deal that much true damage.

bonus.value: Dragons are immune to Magic damage
If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their maximum health

tribes.name: Glacial
tribes.effect: Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun for 2s.

tribes.name: Noble
tribes.effect: +100 Armor and heal 35 health per attack.

tribes.name: Ninja
tribes.effect: The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 Ninjas.

bonus.value: Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player
Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, setting their HP to 100
Robots start combat at full mana
All basic attacks ignore 50% of the enemy's Armor

tribes.name: Wild
tribes.effect: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives 8% Attack Speed.

tribes.name: Yordle
tribes.effect: Attacks against ally Yordles have a chance to miss.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.effect: Assassins leap to the farthest enemy at the start of combat and deal additional Critical Strike Damage.

classes.name: Blademaster
classes.effect: Blademasters have a 35% chance to strike additional times each attack.

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.effect: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks.

bonus.value: At the start of combat, summon a Golem
At the start of combat, all Guardians and adjacent allies receive +30 armor.

classes.name: Gunslinger
classes.effect: After attacking, Gunslingers have a 50% chance to fire additional attacks.

bonus.value: Attack all other enemies in range

classes.name: Knight
classes.effect: Knights block damage from basic attacks.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.effect: Rangers have a chance to double their attack speed for the next 3s.

classes.name: Shapeshifter
classes.effect: Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform.

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.effect: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking and allies have increased spell damage.
